text: @afneil For the record, again.. Germany registers Covid19 mortalities through the 375 Gesundheitsämter according to WHO rules , and the numbers have been confirmed by the Statisches Bundesamt and the Robert Koch Institute. These two super spreader incidents will not increase mortality.
